Package nzilbb.ag.serialize.util

Class ConfigurationHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • nzilbb.ag.serialize.util.ConfigurationHelper
  • public class ConfigurationHelper
extends Object
    Helper functions for dealing with (de)serializer configurations.
    Author:
    Robert Fromont robert@fromont.net.nz

      static String ConfigurationFilename​(SerializationDescriptor descriptor)
      Transforms the given descriptor's MIME type name into something that is safe to use as a file name.
      static File LoadConfiguration​(SerializationDescriptor descriptor, ParameterSet configuration, File directory, Schema schema)
      Loads configuration for a (de)serializer from an XML file, whose path is determined by the given descriptor and the given directory.

      Loads a (de)serialization configuratation from the given parameter map (most likely from a servlet request) the icon file for the given descriptor has been extracted to the given directory.

    • Method Detail

      • SaveConfiguration

        public static File SaveConfiguration​(SerializationDescriptor descriptor,
                                     ParameterSet configuration,
                                     File directory)
                              throws IOException
        Ensures the icon file for the given descriptor has been extracted to the given directory.
        Parameters:
        descriptor - Descriptor of serialization.
        directory - Directory to unpack the icon into if it's not already there.
        Returns:
        The icon file.
        Throws:
        IOException - On file IO error.

      • LoadConfiguration

        public static File LoadConfiguration​(SerializationDescriptor descriptor,
                                     ParameterSet configuration,
                                     File directory,
                                     Schema schema)
                              throws IOException
        Loads configuration for a (de)serializer from an XML file, whose path is determined by the given descriptor and the given directory.
        Parameters:
        descriptor - Descriptor of serialization.
        directory - Directory to unpack the icon into if it's not already there.
        schema - Layer schema for retrieval of named layers.
        Returns:
        The XML file.
        Throws:
        IOException - On file IO error.

      • LoadParameters

        public static ParameterSet LoadParameters​(Map<String,​String[]> map,
                                          String keyPrefix,
                                          ParameterSet parameters,
                                          Schema schema)
                                   throws IOException
        Loads a (de)serialization configuratation from the given parameter map (most likely from a servlet request) the icon file for the given descriptor has been extracted to the given directory.
        Parameters:
        map - A parameter map specifying the parameter names and values (the value is an array of String, consistent with javax.serlvet.ServletRequest.getParameterMap(), but the value is expected to be in the first string of the array.
        keyPrefix - An optional prefix for each parameter key.
        parameters - A set of parameters to use for looking for map keys and for receiving the values.
        schema - Layer schema for retrieval of named layers.
        Returns:
        The given ParameterSet, with the values specified by the map loaded.
        Throws:
        IOException - On file IO error.

      • ConfigurationFilename

        public static String ConfigurationFilename​(SerializationDescriptor descriptor)
        Transforms the given descriptor's MIME type name into something that is safe to use as a file name.
        Parameters:
        descriptor - Descriptor of serialization.
        Returns:
        The descriptor's MIME type name transformed into something that is safe to use as a file name.
